item.description:
Let's go bowling! (Rescheduled from Jan 18)

Meet at 3pm at the bowling alley and play till we're tired of it!

Rates:
Shoe Rental: $3
Lane for 6, 1 hour: $15
Lane for 6, 2 hour: $25

The plan is to get 3 lanes for 2 hours and split the lane cost across all people attending. Assuming 19 attendees, that makes total cost around $7. If people do not show up, cost will go up slightly. If people want to keep bowling after 2 hours, we can figure out how many lanes and cost divisions then.
item.name: Rescheduled: Bowling!
